msbt.message: Hey. What happened? Man, I waited forever!Did you You forgot you were supposed to come over, didn't ya?!
Man, I gotta cancel our plans to hang out at my place! Something, uh, came up. Out of the floor.I'll invite you again, just as soon as this whole -and- bugs thing is taken care of!
Oh man, I'm sorry!I forgot I invited you over so I went looking for new bug friends. I won't forget next time! So let's hang out soon, OK?
